|                                               | Planning Note                                                                                      |                                       |             |

|                                               | All Down trains must be planned to stop at Westbury Down TC Entry/Exit.                            |                                       |             |

|                                               | Note: this TIPLOC cannot be used for shunting into the Down Yard; a subsequent TIPLOC is required. |                                       |             |
